snippet.title: Deep Rock Galactic: Season 3 - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
On Thursday, November 3rd, at 1:00 PM (CET), we will launch Season 3 of Deep Rock Galactic on Steam! 

To celebrate this we have prepared a short (1 minute) release trailer to showcase all the goodies of Season 3: Plaguefall. So when this video premiers Season 3 will be live and kicking!

Prepare for PLAGUEFALL!

Season 3 will launch on consoles (Xbox and PlayStation) on November 17th.

--------------------
DEEP ROCK GALACTIC is a co-op-first sci-fi FPS featuring badass space Dwarves, 100% destructible environments, procedurally-generated caves, and endless hordes of alien monsters.

--------------------
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/548430
Microsoft Store: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productId/9NHFVWX1V7QJ
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/233449/
--------------------
Find out more:
http://www.deeprockgalactic.com/
https://deeprockgalactic.fandom.com/wiki/Deep_Rock_Galactic_Wiki

Follow Deep Rock Galactic:
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/DeepRockGalactic
Discord:  https://www.discord.gg/drg
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/joindeeprock/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/joindeeprock/
https://www.twitch.tv/ghostship_games
